author: Miranda Richardson
method: Place the pomegranate molasses, olive oil and white wine vinegar in a clean jam jar. Put the lid on the jar and shake well. Season with salt and freshly ground pepper to taste and use the dressing on your favourite salad.
ingredients: 1 tbsp pomegranate molasses ,  6 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp white wine vinegar,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
